USER_PROFILE.TITLE: User profile
USER_PROFILE.NAME: Name
USER_PROFILE.MODAL_DESCRIPTION: This action cannot be undone. It will permanently delete the user.
USER_PROFILE.PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Enter the new password for the user.
USER_PROFILE.PASSWORD_PLACEHOLDER: Enter the new password for the user.
USER_PROFILE.REPEAT_PASSWORD_PLACEHOLDER: Repeat the new password for the user.
USER_PROFILE.INFO_DESCRIPTION: Here you can see the user information.
USER_PROFILE.EMAIL_PLACEHOLDER: Enter the email for the user.
USER_PROFILE.NAME_PLACEHOLDER: Enter the name for the user.

CREATE_USER.TITLE: Create user
CREATE_USER.NAME_PLACEHOLDER: Enter the name for the user.
CREATE_USER.EMAIL_PLACEHOLDER: Enter the email for the user.

CUSTOMIZATION.TITLE: Customization
CUSTOMIZATION.INFO_DESCRIPTION: Here you can customize the appearance of the application.
CUSTOMIZATION.PROJECT_NAME_PLACEHOLDER: Enter the name of the project.
CUSTOMIZATION.APPEARANCE_DESCRIPTION: Here you can customize the appearance of the application.
CUSTOMIZATION.COLOR_PRIMARY_PLACEHOLDER: Select the primary color of the application.
CUSTOMIZATION.COLOR_SECONDARY_PLACEHOLDER: Select the secondary color of the application.
CUSTOMIZATION.COLOR_ACCENT_PLACEHOLDER: Select the accent color of the application.
CUSTOMIZATION.LINKS_DESCRIPTION: Here you can customize the links of the application.
